name: Pizza
recipeInfo: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C). Roll out pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella cheese and toppings of your choice (pepperoni, vegetables, etc.). Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted.

name: Salad
recipeInfo: In a bowl, mix lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions. Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Optionally, add feta cheese or nuts for extra flavor.

name: Sweet Potato
recipeInfo: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Peel and cube sweet potatoes. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, and paprika. Roast on a baking sheet for 25-30 minutes, turning halfway through.

name: Gnocchi
recipeInfo: Boil salted water in a pot. Add gnocchi and cook until they float, about 2-3 minutes. Drain and toss with butter and sage, or serve with marinara sauce and grated Parmesan.

name: Pot Roast
recipeInfo: Season a beef roast with salt and pepper. Sear in a hot pan until browned on all sides. Place in a slow cooker with carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic, and beef broth. Cook on low for 6-8 hours.

name: Lasagna
recipeInfo: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Layer lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, mozzarella, marinara sauce, and ground beef or sausage in a baking dish. Repeat layers and bake for 45 minutes, covered, then uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes.

name: Hamburger
recipeInfo: Season ground beef with salt and pepper. Form patties and cook in a pan or on a grill over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side. Serve on a bun with lettuce, tomato, onions, cheese, and condiments.

name: Pad Thai
recipeInfo: Cook rice noodles according to package. In a pan, sauté garlic, shrimp or chicken, and eggs. Add noodles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar. Toss with bean sprouts, peanuts, and lime juice before serving.

name: Almonds
recipeInfo: No cooking required! Simply enjoy raw almonds as a healthy snack, or lightly toast them in a pan for a roasted flavor.

name: Sarma
recipeInfo: Mix ground meat, rice, and spices. Roll the mixture into cabbage leaves. Place rolls in a pot with tomato sauce and water. Simmer on low heat for 2-3 hours until tender.

name: Bacon
recipeInfo: Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy, about 4-5 minutes per side. Drain on paper towels before serving.

name: Hot Dog
recipeInfo: Grill or boil the hot dog for 5-7 minutes. Serve in a bun with your choice of condiments like mustard, ketchup, onions, and relish.

name: Chocolate Cake
recipeInfo: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter, and baking powder. Pour into a greased cake pan and bake for 25-30 minutes. Let cool before frosting with chocolate icing.

name: Wheat Bread
recipeInfo: In a bowl, mix whole wheat flour, yeast, salt, and water. Knead the dough for 10 minutes. Let rise for 1 hour, then bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30-35 minutes until golden brown.

name: Orange
recipeInfo: No cooking required! Simply peel the orange and enjoy it as a fresh, juicy snack.

name: Banana
recipeInfo: No cooking required! Peel and eat the banana as a quick, nutritious snack, or slice it over cereal or yogurt.

name: Yogurt
recipeInfo: No preparation required! Enjoy yogurt as is, or add fresh fruit, honey, and granola for a healthy and delicious treat.
